keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

byline.contributor: Anne Barnard contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon, and Somini Sengupta from the United Nations.

lead_paragraph: European and Israeli intelligence officials believe the pause in fighting may consolidate President Bashar al-Assad’s hold on power.

headline.print_headline: Truce Comes With Price, but Not for Assad
headline.main: Syria Truce Comes With Price, but Not for Assad

snippet: European and Israeli intelligence officials believe the pause in fighting may consolidate President Bashar al-Assad’s hold on power.
abstract: News Analysis; European and Israeli intelligence officials say Syria faces partition despite agreement for landmark cease-fire; experts fear unintended consequence of pause in civil war may be to consolidate Pres Bashar al-Assad’s hold on power for next few years.
